channel.title: A few error's (member/donator)
channel.description: I need to find out how to make a member shop, I tried to but I got a lot of error's. I don't really know how to make a shop anyway. It's really a "Donator Shop". I need to find out how to make a certain item only available to donators and not normal players, I'm sure there is a tutorial but I can't find it..
